casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Artie Stevenson SMITH, Jr. No. 253P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Noell P. Tin, Charlotte, for Smith, Artie Stevenson (Jr.). Charles G. Whitehead, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Rick Shaffer, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st of July 2015 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
